title: Visual Schematic Strategies and Cognitive Style-Tailored Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Social Studies Content and Experience with Digital Devices
context.additional_context: Learning to visually represent elementary social studies content through diagramming, while developing personalized strategies based on learners' cognitive styles (visual/verbal, holistic/analytical)

learning_goals: Learners can represent social studies concepts using three visual diagramming methods (LT, RoCS, GRF)
Learners can diagnose their cognitive styles (visual/verbal, holistic/analytical) and incorporate them into learning strategies
Learners can achieve comprehension scores at least 20% higher than RoCS by using GRF and LT methods
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
